text:
The ST. regis doha launches truffle season Published on : Monday, October 26, 2015
Astor Grill, the renowned New York Steak house, located at the St. Regis Doha, the finest address in Doha, is celebrating truffle season throughout the months of October and November. The award-winning restaurant will be incorporating the “diamonds of the kitchen” in to three of its exquisite dishes showcasing the precious and rare delicacy.
The exclusive truffle menu features a black truffle risotto with organic poach egg and wild mushroom foam, a caramelized onion crusted braised rib served with herbal spinach, potato mousseline and truffle jus, and a stuffed poached pear with black truffle served with truffle ice cream.
The black jewels used in these dishes originates from Perigord, a natural region in France renowned globally renowned in the culinary industry of its for its fine truffle offerings
Cultivating this fine ingredient is not an easy process, as it is proven that truffle is difficult to attain.
Chef Jean-Luc Morcellet, Executive Chef at the St. Regis Doha, commented, “The St. Regis Doha is recognized for its diverse and innovative dining offerings. This is our first year to launch a Truffle themed menu, and we are delighted with the positive feedback that we are receiving from our diners, who have shown great appreciation towards this flavor-rich ingredient.”
Astor Grill is notorious for its fine grills, exceptional flavors and diversity of dishes. The renowned restaurant has been awarded with a number of accolades in the recent years, which include: Time Out Doha “Highly Commended Best Contemporary European Restaurant” and Time Out Doha “Shortlisted Best Steakhouse”.
